messages.title: Re-elect Stewart McDonald
messages.content: A Strong Voice for Glasgow South

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting against the closure of Glasgow's Job Centres and working to keep Job Centres open and local.

issues.brexitEurope: As the Prime Minister takes us towards an increasingly difficult Brexit, it is vital that our area has an MP who will stand up for the most vulnerable and hold the increasingly irresponsible approach to Brexit that the UK Government is pursuing.
issues.governance: Returning as the largest party in Glasgow - ending decades of Labour rule at Glasgow City Chambers.
issues.socialWelfare: Working to keep Job Centres open and local, ensuring they do not close.

leaflet.personalStatement: In my first two years I have shown that I'm not afraid to stand up for you and tell it like it is at Westminster. On the 8th of June, I need your support to help me continue this work.

images.caption: Photo of Stewart McDonald, SNP candidate for Glasgow South.

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet seems focused on the issues surrounding Brexit and the local job centers, with a personal statement emphasizing Stewart McDonald's commitment to representing his constituents, particularly in the face of challenges such as Brexit.
